Umesh Ved & Associates, Practicing Company Secretary as the Secretarial Auditor of the Company for the financial year 2022-23; Appointment of M/s. MBD & Co LLP, Chartered Accountants (Firm Registration No. 135129W/W100152) as an Internal Auditor of the Company for the financial year 2022-23.
